div.head: Description of changes for 2011.10
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft created from the Reims and Vatican manuscripts. A provisional apparatus has been constructed from these two manuscripts. Corrections and additions to both text and apparatus await the completion of transcriptions of the Sorbonne and St. Victor manuscripts. Names have been given ref attributes to refer them to their canonical instance. Citations and cross-references still need to be made.
